changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Adds various patient status to dictionary
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO dictionary( id, is_active, dict_entry, lastupdated, dictionary_category_id, display_key) VALUES ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'none', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'education') , 'dictionary.education.none'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'primary', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'education') , 'dictionary.education.primary'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'secondary' , now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'education') , 'dictionary.education.secondary'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'upper', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'education') , 'dictionary.education.upper'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'single', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'marriage') , 'dictionary.marriage.single'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'married', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'marriage') , 'dictionary.marriage.married'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'livingWith', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'marriage') , 'dictionary.marriage.livingWith'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'divorced', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'marriage') , 'dictionary.marriage.divorced'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'widowed', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'marriage') , 'dictionary.marriage.widowed'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'DNA', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'marriage') , 'dictionary.marriage.DNA'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'Ivoirian', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'nation') , 'dictionary.nationality.Ivoirian'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'West African', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'nation') , 'dictionary.nationality.african.west'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'African', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'nation') , 'dictionary.nationality.african'), ( nextval( 'dictionary_seq' ), 'Y', 'other', now(), (select id from clinlims.dictionary_category where local_abbrev = 'nation') , 'dictionary.nationality.other');

changeSet.sql: delete from clinlims.organization where id in ( select org_id from clinlims.organization_organization_type where org_type_id = (select id from clinlims.organization_type where short_name = 'referring clinic'));
